fields.label: HIV Status

options.text: Status not required based on risk assessment

fields.label: Is Child enrolled on ART?
If child is HIV+ but not on ART, has s/he been referred to Health facility for enrollment into clinical care
Check the ART appointment card.  Did child meet the last clinical/pharmacy appointment?

If child missed last clinical/pharmacy appointment, not adhering 
to treatment or VL is greater than 1000, age appropriate 
adherence counselling was conducted during home visit?
If child is on ART, is s/he adhering to medication?

fields.hint: Indicate the number of months the child has been on ART

v_required.err: Indicate the number of months the child has been on ART

fields.label: If the child has been on ART for longer than six months, have they submitted a sample for VL?

fields.text: If Primary Caregiver has not had a VL done, refer to facility for VL testing
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Is the child on single or multi-month dispensation (MMD)?

fields.hint: Indicate the number of MMD months of drugs

v_required.err: Indicate the number of MMD months of drugs

fields.hint: How many months was the last HIV test done?

fields.label: If first home visit and HIV test was conducted more than 3 months ago, has an HIV risk assessment been done?

Has child been referred for HIV testing at health facility if the HIV 
risk assessment indicates an HIV test is required?
Has there been a change in the child’s HIV risky behavior since the last visit?

Was child referred to age appropriate HIV prevention support 
(e.g. VMMC, Condoms etc)

If there has been a change in the child’s HIV risk behavior since the last visit has an HIV risk reduction counselling 
and HIV risk assessment been conducted?

fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note
fields.text: If HIV status unknown, conduct HIV risk reduction counselling and risk assessment

fields.label: Has Primary Caregiver been referred to health facility for HIV testing if test is required?

fields.text: HIV Exposed Infant (VCA aged 24 months and below) Section

fields.hint:
Check child’s under-five clinic card
 When was the last EID test done?

fields.label: Is the duration from the last test appropriate for age of child?

If duration from last test not appropriate for age of child, has the 
child been referred to health facility for EID?
Is infant still breastfeeding?
If infant not breastfeeding, was a DBS done at least 6 weeks after cessation

If infant was not tested for HIV 6 weeks after cessation of 
breastfeeding, has the child been referred for HIV testing?

fields.text: Knowledge of HIV/AIDS (10-17 Years Old) Section

fields.label: Is the child able to describe at least two HIV infection risks in their local community?
Is the child able to correctly describe the location of at least one place where HIV prevention support is available?
Is the child able to provide at least one example of how they can protect themselves against HIV risk?
If applicable, has the child/adolescent been referred for substance abuse support?

If the child cannot describe at least two HIV infection risks in 
their local community or provide at least one example of how 
they can protect themselves against HIV risk or correctly describe 
the location of at least one place where HIV prevention support, 
has the child been provided with HIV risk reduction counselling?
Has child been referred to health facility for HIV testing if test is required?
Has the child been attending under-five clinic regularly?

If child has not been attending under-five clinic, has counselling 
been provided to the child’s caregiver?
Has the child received all appropriate vaccinations?

If child has not received all appropriate vaccinations, has s/he 
been referred to the health facility?

fields.hint: What is the child’s MUAC measurement?

fields.label: Was the primary caregiver of the child provided with nutrition counselling?
Was the child referred to the health facility to access HEPS

fields.text: Nutrition (ALL VCA except Under-Five Children) Section

fields.hint: What is the child’s MUAC measurement?

fields.label: Was the primary caregiver of the child provided with nutrition counselling?
Was the child referred to the health facility to access HEPS
With reference to the age of the child, what is the nutrition status of the child?
Are there any signs that the child is being neglected or exploited?
If child is being neglected/exploited, has the child and caregiver participated in a structured family group conferencing to prevent occurrence/ reoccurrence of child exploitation or neglect?

If child is being neglected/exploited, has the family participated 
in a structured psycho-social support related to family conflict 
mitigation and family relationships?
If child is 12 years and above, has s/he reported experiencing neglect or exploitation?
Are there any signs that the child is experiencing physical violence?

If child is experiencing physical violence, has the child received 
legal assistance related to the case
If child is 12 years and above, has s/he reported experiencing physical violence?

Was a report filed of suspected abuse to child protection office, 
police or other local authority?

fields.text: Sexual and/or Gender Based Violence Section

fields.label: Are there any signs that the child is being sexually abused?

If child is being sexually abused, has s/he been referred to the 
health facility for post GBV care?

If child is/was being sexually abused, has s/he been referred to 
VSU for legal support?

Did the Caregiver participate in an evidence-based parenting 
intervention to prevent and reduce violence and/or sexual risk 
of their children?
If child is 12 years and above, has s/he reported experiencing any from of sexual abuse?

fields.hint: list the signs observed or type of violence reported

fields.label: Was an assessment for the child`s psychosocial needs done?
Was the child referred for other services?
Is child currently in school (if child is of school going age)?

If child is of school going age is not in school, were the barriers 
to being in school discussed?

fields.hint: How many days of school has the child missed in the past 6 months?

fields.label:
If the number of school days missed were 20% or more, were 
the challenges and/or barriers to school attendance discussed?
Was the child/household referred?

fields.hint:
Indicate service for which the 
child/household was 
referred
Days missed as reported by OVC/Caregiver
Days missed verified by the school

What grade was the child doing in the
 last calendar year?

What grade is the child doing in the 
current calendar year?

fields.label:
If child of school going age did not progress to the next grade 
at the start of this calendar year, were the barriers to 
progression discussed?
Was the child/household referred?

fields.hint:
Indicate service for which the 
child/household was 
referred

fields.label: I hereby confirms that the information I have given is true
I hereby confirms that the information I have given is true
